name: Stickman Warriors
summary:
This fighting game will give you a chance to become one of super heroes to fight with enemies and protect everybody on earth. Enter into the arena and fight for the survival. If you love playing games then this is the game which will amaze you with the swift handling and amazing features.

With addictive gameplay fighters, your enemies will upgrade their power and you have to fight for survival. To fight against the most Boss likes Ninja Black, Big Thunder lizards..., the shadow stick fighter may need to upgrade your power to the highest level. We bet you will enjoy the abundant upgrades for and all your stickman heroes in the best action RPG fighting game.
